RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata

Added PublicationInfo. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains electron cyclotron frequency, plasma frequency, upper hybrid frequency, and electron density data from the Plasma Wave Experiment on board CREES at about 8 s resolution.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: NASA; Department of Defense-Department of the Air Force (United States); AFRL; Dr. Roger R. Anderson; Dr. E. Gary Mullen

PublicationInfo.Authors: Anderson, Roger R.; Mullen, E. G.

InformationURL.Name: CRRES Plasma Wave Experiment
InformationURL.Description: NASA NSSDC CRRES plasma wave experiment details

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: NASA; Department of Defense-Department of the Air Force (United States); AFRL; Dr. Roger R. Anderson; Dr. E. Gary Mullen

TimeSpan.Note: Time format in data files is: Year-Month-Day Hour Minute Second (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.SSS)

Parameter.Name: CRRES Plasma Wave Experiment Vehicle Time Code Word at 8 s resolution
Parameter.ParameterKey: Plasma Wave Experiment Vehicle Time Code Word
Parameter.Description: CRRES Plasma Wave Experiment vehicle time code word at 8 s resolution.
Parameter.Caveats: Flags=-999; Flag does not alway adhere to this value.

Parameter.Name: CRRES Plasma Wave Experiment Year and Day of Year at 8 s resolution
Parameter.ParameterKey: Plasma Wave Experiment year and DOY
Parameter.Description: CRRES Plasma Wave Experiment year and DOY in the format of YYDDD (2 digit year and 3 digit day of year) at 8 s resolution.
Parameter.Caveats: Flags=-999; Flag does not alway adhere to this value.

Parameter.Name: Universal Time
Parameter.Description: Universal Time columns from left to right are: hour minute sec in the format of hh:mm:ss.
Parameter.Caveats: Flags=-999; Flag does not alway adhere to this value.

Structure.Description: Universal Time expressed using a 3-column hour, minute, second representation

Parameter.Name: CRRES Plasma Wave Experiment Electron Cyclotron Frequency at 8 s resolution
Parameter.ParameterKey: Plasma Wave Experiment electron cyclotron frequency
Parameter.Description: CRRES Plasma Wave Experiment electron cyclotron frequency at 8 s resolution in units of KHz.
Parameter.Caveats: Flags=-999; Flag does not alway adhere to this value.

Parameter.Name: CRRES Plasma Wave Experiment Upper Hybrid Resonance Frequency at 8 s resolution
Parameter.ParameterKey: Plasma Wave Experiment upper hybrid resonance frequency
Parameter.Description: CRRES Plasma Wave Experiment upper hybrid resonance frequency at 8 s resolution in units of KHz.
Parameter.Caveats: Flags=-999; Flag does not alway adhere to this value.

Parameter.Name: CRRES Plasma Wave Experiment Plasma Frequency at 8 s resolution
Parameter.Description: CRRES Plasma Wave Experiment plasma frequency at 8 s resolution in units of KHz.
Parameter.Caveats: Flags=-999; Flag does not alway adhere to this value.

Parameter.Name: CRRES Plasma Wave Experiment Electron Density at 8 s resolution
Parameter.Description: CRRES Plasma Wave Experiment electron density at 8 s resolution in units of cm^-3.
Parameter.Caveats: Flags=-999; Flag does not alway adhere to this value.

Parameter.Name: CRRES Plasma Wave Experiment Internal Code at 8 s resolution
Parameter.Description: CRRES Plasma Wave Experiment internal code at 8 s resolution.
Parameter.Caveats: Flags=-999; Flag does not alway adhere to this value.

Parameter.Name: CRRES Plasma Wave Experiment Instrument Mode at 8 s resolution
Parameter.Description: CRRES Plasma Wave Experiment instrument mode at 8 s resolution. This mode identifies the frequency range the instrument was in to identify the plasma frequency (M=P) or uppder hybrid resonance frequency (M=U).
Parameter.Caveats: Flags=-999; Flag does not alway adhere to this value.
